thread.section_title: Cruisesalefinder Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cruisesalefinder | cruisesalefinder.com.au
thread.title: Elise Peck

author: Elise Peck
title: Elise Peck
text: Very helpful & courteous. I wish the cruise line allowed the oceanview room to have one big room for myself, husband & 2yr old... 3 bunk beds is going to work very easily with us all usually bedsharing. The consultant has put in a request for a double bed & cot... just so we can get a double bed. Wish we could just get one big bed! Hopefully it's a cot we can fold away so it doesn't take up room. Waiting to hear back on what the bedding configuration will be. Other than that, all good and well explained to me.
